abstract: Forget Sturgis, the annual South Dakota bikers’ rally. Harley-Davidson riders may want to shift gears and head toward Omaha, Breakingviews says. That’s because the motorcycle maker just joined General Electric, Coca-Cola, Goldman Sachs and Budweiser in Warren Buffett’s collection of iconic American corporate brands.
lead_paragraph: Forget Sturgis, the annual South Dakota bikers’ rally. Harley-Davidson riders may want to shift gears and head toward Omaha, Breakingviews says. That’s because the motorcycle maker just joined General Electric, Coca-Cola, Goldman Sachs and Budweiser in Warren Buffett’s collection of iconic American corporate brands.

headline.main: Buffett Pays Low for Another Icon
